citations.narrative:
A search was conducted at an exotic auction open to the public on 4/15/23. There were 3 zebras, a camel, and 5 bison
sold without the auction being licensed.
A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act
and Regulations. The facility needs to obtain a USDA license or discontinue regulated activities until licensed.
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained. An application packet was provided and the
facility stated they would apply for a USDA license.
Correct prior to any regulated activity.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
CHRISTINA RADZAI, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1)  Critical
   
Requirements and application. 
A search was conducted at an exotic auction open to the public on 4/15/23.  There were 3 zebras, a camel, and 5 bison 
sold without the auction being licensed. 
 
A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act 
and Regulations.  The facility needs to obtain a USDA license or discontinue regulated activities until licensed. 
 
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained.  An application packet was provided and the 
facility stated they would apply for a USDA license. 
Correct prior to any regulated activity. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
CHRISTINA RADZAI, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
